1328400.name: Fight'N'Jokes
1328400.description:
Prepare for an intergalactic showdown in 'Fight'N'Jokes' as a sinister phantom menace emerges from the depths of the galaxy and sets its sights on the once-humorous realm of the Jokes. The malevolent Dark Father, notorious for transforming countless planets into rubbish dumps, now targets the planet Joke for his nefarious plans.

In a bid to thwart this comedic catastrophe, a grand tournament assembles the planet's finest fighters, with the ultimate challenge being to confront and defeat the wicked overlord in a climactic showdown.

Select one of ten unique characters, engage in fierce battles against formidable opponents, hone your combat skills, and strive to conquer the planet now under the threat of jestful annihilation. Each character brings their own captivating backstory and motivations to the tournament, and it's your mission to unravel their tales by unlocking secretive characters.

Embracing a retro gaming aesthetic, 'Fight'N'Jokes' faithfully emulates the nostalgic resolution of 320x200 reminiscent of classic MS-DOS games from the '90s.

Gameplay Highlights and Achievements:

  • After each triumphant journey through the tournament, you'll square off against the menacing Dark Father and your personal arch-nemesis in a comically bizarre showdown to conclude the character's storyline.
  • Every character boasts a special 'Final' move known as 'Dementiality,' where they unleash hilariously absurd maneuvers upon their opponents. Unlock achievements by discovering and executing these unique combinations. A handy indicator at the bottom of the screen displays the correct move, allowing players to memorize or retry until they succeed.
  • Uncover the hidden secrets of the game by unlocking four enigmatic characters through exceptional performance or unexpected encounters. These secret characters possess their own captivating storylines and equally amusing Dementiality codes.

In summary, 'Fight'N'Jokes' offers a total of 32 achievements to conquer, including:

  • 14 Unique Endings
  • 14 Outrageously Funny Dementialities
  • 4 Mysterious Secret Characters

Get ready to embark on a laugh-inducing adventure and become the savior of the Jokes!
1328400.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
